website_summaries.verdict: The cutest little butter warmer stylish enough to go direct to your table from the stovetop.
pros: Teal color, but also comes in red or dark blue
Small serving size for one person
Great for also heating milk or water for a cup of tea or cocoa
cons: This butter warmer includes a pour spout, but it is not terribly effective

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: Arrived with chip, badly repaired
customer_reviews.text: This pot had a prior chip on the handle that had an attempt at repair that did not even match the enamel color. The repair also did not cover the entire chip, leaving a rough spot that is unsuitable for using the handle bare-handed. I am returning for an exchange and will amend this review should the next pot be satisfactory. UPDATE: Received my replacement, and the lid had multiple (attempted) repaired chips in the enamel on the handle as well as where the handle meets the lid. I'm starting to wonder if this listing is for factory seconds? Extremely disappointing to receive a pot that is not in "new" condition at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy here—buy directly from Dansk at Lennox
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Love this pot. Love the color, the design and the function. 3 months in the finish started chipping off. It looks terrible and is already starting to rust. I think we got a bad glaze as we haven’t done much beyond boil pasta and veggies in here and only ever washed by hand. Tried to file a claim with the seller and the said to take it up with the manufacturer. Tried to file a claim with Dansk directly and they won’t honor it since it’s from amazon. Would buy this pot again, but would NOT buy it from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Chipped
customer_reviews.text: I love my Dansk pots, but this one came out of the box with a chip in the enamel on the handle. For what this cost​, I expect heirloom quality. My other Dansk pots are lovely and worth what I paid for them. I wish I hadn't bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: This product is a Knock off!!! It does not hold up like the real Dansk brand!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived badly chipped. Then after only one use, the entire enamel on the inside stained even with careful cautious use. I received a set of dansk pots for my wedding And they are much much more durable. That is probably why these are half price.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo1028

customer_reviews.title: Great little pot, works on induction stove tops.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pot, it is so charming and cute. It’s tiny, about 3 1/2“ x 3 1/2“, so don’t buy it if you’re not looking for a tiny pot. But it’s just what we were looking for to make our “queso for two“. We only make about 10 ounces a sitting, and this is perfect. And it works on our induction stove top!
customer_reviews.author: C. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I read quite a few bad reviews about this pan but since it was on sale and incredibly beautiful I decided to buy it anyway. I own a lot of enamel pans and never took special care of them but I treated this beauty like a museum piece. Nevertheless after using it a couple of times the enamel on the handle melted and popped even though it wasn’t even close the (low) fire. My advice? Skip the reissues and buy a vintage Dansk Kobenstyle. You don’t have to use it so delicately and it will last you way longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchie

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Very special dishes made by Mother so has a lot of good memories.
customer_reviews.author: Malin

customer_reviews.title: it's ok but too small >"<
customer_reviews.text: When i received it i was excited but a little disppointed because it was small than what i imagined! only serving for one person. I use it to warm up milk with black tea it's great and works well !
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Repeatedly Defective
customer_reviews.text: Returned it 3 times. Each time the enamel had a bubble or chip.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stein

customer_reviews.title: A Joy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking, and was thrilled to receive this beautifully designed Danish casserole. I am a pensioner, and this was my first ever purchase on the internet. The casserole was excellently packed in polystyrene moulds and polythene air bags, and arrived a day ahead of forecast.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Old Dansk Quality
customer_reviews.text: Dansk of Old in a beautiful modern color. Hope they come out with a 12 quart spaghetti pot soon!
customer_reviews.author: J Green

customer_reviews.title: The missing size from most cookware sets
customer_reviews.text: Hold 2 cups (1 pint) plus a half inch at the top, so it's the perfect size for a helping of soup, or to warm a serving of leftovers. Will also be perfect for a garlic butter dip for Dungeness crab. Love the turquoise color, perfectly matches a set of cookware I already owned. Delivered quickly in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: chips easily
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful but it chipped right away and now I have to see it broken all the time.
customer_reviews.author: TaliK

customer_reviews.title: Love Dansk Kobenstyle's midcentury modern design and enameled stainless steel ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Dansk Kobenstyle's midcentury modern design and enameled stainless steel is nothing to sneeze at! Never understood the snobbery behind Le Creuset, especially as Dansk cookware is not quite as expensive and is just as long-lasting. This cute retro butter warmer is the perfect size for making a generous cup of tea, soup, coffee, hot cocoa etc. No idea why Teal was cheaper but lucky me!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzafish

customer_reviews.title: It drips!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this looks. I've been using it a long time. But you can't pour without dripping and having it run down the side. I'm just tired of cleaning up drops all the time. Looking for something else now.
customer_reviews.author: AM. Roeder

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and a great size
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this pot in "Salt, Fat, Acid, Heat." Samin's was yellow, but the teal is just as pretty. It was a smaller size, which fit a gap I had in my own cookware collection. I love that the lid also doubles as a trivet.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Richey

customer_reviews.title: Nor what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Way to small the pic makes it look like a cooking pot this thing is wayyyyyyy to small
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA DORSETT

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I am a nut for mid-century plus needed something to serve melted butter, syrup, etc. Saw this at A and really like it. I have a induction range and this works on the range. The color is perfect for my home. I also like that the cover can work as a trivit.
customer_reviews.author: North Gate Outlander

customer_reviews.title: I never left a bad review on Amazon before
customer_reviews.text: I brought this pod about 6 month ago, barely use it. After using it for a few times, the cloth on bottom starting getting off. This pod is completely unusable now. I never left a bad review on Amazon before. This is the first time I got so disappointed with a product. Definitely not worth to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Claire C.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent enamel
customer_reviews.text: Like most other reviews - visible chips on top and enameled is inconsistent. Also color is not turquoise, mirr like a flat teal color. Keeping it bc it was not worth returning w/shipping fees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. The spout to pour out the liquid is ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The spout to pour out the liquid is not deep enough thus the liquid flows out as you pour and its a bit of a mess. I thought it is designed for this purpose (sauce).. not sure if it is a defect item :(
customer_reviews.author: polkadots

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it to warm milk for my son. Very fast to heat up
customer_reviews.author: Radenli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store, clean and cook with, perfect for a small kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This casserole pot is wonderful to have if you have a small kitchen. It's easy to store and easy to clean. Be careful though that the handles are not heat resistant so you will need to use a small tea towel or oven mitten to hold the handle if you are cooking. The convenience and the style still supersedes this small hiccup - hence the five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The edges can get dings so be careful letting others clean for you.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for soup and sauce! It’s pretty and lightweight, easy to clean. We use it almost everyday, cooking for two or four.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Meissner

customer_reviews.title: Is it my fault but I wish there's a better design that prevents the heat burn the wooden handle
customer_reviews.text: The cup is really cute but the handle is made by wood. I left it on the stove and my handle was burned!!!! OH NO!. It now sits there with black burn mark. Is it my fault but I wish there's a better design that prevents the heat burn the wooden handle.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for melting butter
customer_reviews.text: Love this little pan. Pours weird but not that big a deal
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pot. Like the style. Looks like it will last but have to reserve judgment because it is so new.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Like it. Quality is good, more important is it’s a good looking pot. :-)
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Really small so perfect size for popcorn butter. Hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful casserole
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful color. I was replacing a red one and when I saw the teal decided for that as it matched our kitchen walls.
customer_reviews.author: W. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding gift!
customer_reviews.text: it's a wedding gift for my friend, and she likes it!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Honestly,  tell the public exact size of the pot.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it because it is too small. It is useless to me.I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY I.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and nice design to serve directly to the table, in time delivery! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. Color is great. Heating is even and the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice color but not the same as the japanese amazon,no brand on it
customer_reviews.author: JINGYING CHEN  CARLB

customer_reviews.title: great design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I like it. The top can be used as a stand for it.
customer_reviews.author: yeshafeng

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, chipped all over the edges upon opening
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited when I received it, but upon opening I found that the sides (edges) of the pot are chipped all over. Either the quality control was done poorly or the overall quality of the brand is not good. Not sure if the chipping is 'common' for this brand or just an isolated case, because it's the first time I buy this brand, I am primarily a Le Creuset and Staub user.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought a pair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a very old red Dansk casserole and like it so much I got a 6-quart to match.
customer_reviews.author: W. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is good and lovely. I use it to cooking milk tea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this little pot practically everyday in many different ways. I use it as a butter warmer, a hot chocolate maker and mostly to make my daily cup of quick-cook steel cut oats. Then I just eat it right out of pot. It does seem like a lot of money for such a little pot, but I've become dependent on it. especially since I am trying to use the microwave oven less. It looks beautiful sitting on my stove top all day. The only thing I would recommend is to use a light neutral oil on the wooden handle occasionally to keep it soft, beautiful and not dried out from daily use/washing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly World

customer_reviews.title: But the quality is poor. When Dansk didn't do a good job on ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an expensive pot. But the quality is poor. When Dansk didn't do a good job on it's coating. There are some edge on both pot and the lid were not coated, you can feel the rough edge. Worst of all after our first cooking the lid began to rust. We have cooked a few and leave the lid on the next thing we know was the rusting area has spread. Poor quality control on such an expansive casserole. WILL NOT RECOMMEND THE POT.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: My new fave stovetop vessel
customer_reviews.text: After seeing this being used by a chef I knew I had to have one, simply for the awesome Lid/trivet! However I’ve grown to love cooking all kinds of dishes from soups to pastas to oatmeal! It’s also very easy to clean. I want more of them!
customer_reviews.author: Trish HK

customer_reviews.title: Great casserole.
customer_reviews.text: We received one of these, maybe 8 quart, when we got married 40 years ago in March. We still use it regularly, and it still looks good. If, anything, the new one looks better and is even easier to clean! After baking, that is important. We just love these casseroles. They are not inexpensive, but they last and last, and continue looking very nice on the table.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Soup
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, and the recipient is very happy with it as an easy to clean pot for regularly cooking home made soups.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lyle

customer_reviews.title: enamel chips and paint flakes
customer_reviews.text: Pan looks beautiful new, within a week of light use the enamel began to chip and the paint on the underside flake off. Was really excited about this pan, but the quality seems to be very low. Customer service for Dansk said they couldn't do anything because Amazon is not a 'represented client.' I would take a pass.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: enamel pops off when preheating!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and look of this pot. However, I was preheating the pot in a hot oven to bake a sourdough and the enamel just started popping off. Now I'm not sure of the safety of the product in terms of small enamel chips getting into food.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: The little pot that could
customer_reviews.text: Works good & looks great! Heats up quickly and cleans easily. One has to be careful to offset it a tiny bit so the wood deon’t come in contact with the flames
customer_reviews.author: Earthmother

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware. I've been looking for this color a long time, and i finally found it at a reasonable price. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lo

customer_reviews.title: Enamel cracked!
customer_reviews.text: Total disappointment, have barely used it. Enamel shattered, spewing white enamel shards into the food I fed my infants.
customer_reviews.author: rbeka

customer_reviews.title: Coz I dont like to drink cold milk nor using microwave
customer_reviews.text: Coz I dont like to drink cold milk nor using microwave. This pot is just a perfect pot for heating small potion of drink or food!! not to mention the cutest dreaming color it has~ Only 4 stars because there are some part of the coating paint around the edge were off. :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Dansk 6 quart casserole
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the 2 quart size so much that ordered her the 6 quart size to complement her collection. It is a good size and actually more versatile than the smaller 2 quart.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Flick

customer_reviews.title: Small and handy. I use it to melt chocolate ...
customer_reviews.text: Small and handy. I use it to melt chocolate, heat up water to steep tea, and make turmeric milk.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: SO CUTE! I got it mainly to make baby food and it's basically like a large tea cup. I personally love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: More colors options
customer_reviews.text: The product fits good. And my family use it for instant noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Huang-keng Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Good size for making some rice or warming up leftovers
customer_reviews.text: Good size for making some rice or warming up leftovers. This little pot is attractive enough to sit on the table as a serving dish.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Zweback

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than expected, but doesn't burn milk and it just the cutest pot ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dansk Kobenstyle Casserole
customer_reviews.text: Well made cooking utensil and although expensive, they do a good job and seem like they will hold up for a long time of use.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Flick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Dansk butter warmer, they are so cute and practical!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic...beautiful and fast delivery to Europe. Thank you...thinking about getting another
customer_reviews.author: Bow Haus

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived on time and very good color as I expect
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and very good color as I expect. But, there is a small stain at the side and there is also a tiny part of the paint that chipped off. Wondering if it's defect item?
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C.

product_meta.title: Dansk Kobenstyle Teal Butter Warmer, Small
product_meta.description: Style Name:Butter Warmer| Color:TealThe teal butter warmer bears an ergonomic teak handle that maintains a comfortable temperature as the pot heats. Crafted with three coats of enamel in an inviting teal hue, the Kobenstyle Teal Butter Warmer makes for an easy-to-clean, practical kitchenware addition.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
